posts.post_title: WTB: Matty McIntyre Portrait or Carlos Smith SL in EX to NM
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a perfectly centered, perfectly registered, bright white version of either of these. Those qualities are of the utmost importance.

Please reply here or by email with scan(s) and price(s).
Show me the pink! Haha

Thank you
